meanings.sent1: The small dog's yipping woke up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I heard the yipping of a puppy in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The yipping of the Chihuahua sounded like a tiny alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The yipping of the coyotes echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The constant yipping of the puppy was like a melody in the air.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched bark or yelp.
meanings.sent1: The excited puppy was yipping happily as it played.
meanings.sent2: The dog started yipping when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: I tried yipping back at the dog, but it just looked confused.
meanings.sent4: The children were yipping with joy during the game.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel yipping in the tree caught the dog's attention.
